  • Method Details

    • newEntry

      void newEntry(Entry entry)
      Adds a new entry to the database.
      Parameters:
      entry - the entry object to be added.

    • modifyEntry

      Parameters:

      field -

    • removeEntry

      void removeEntry(String title)
      Removes an entry from the database.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the entry to remove.

    • removeEntry

      void removeEntry(Entry entry)
      Removes an entry from the database.
      Parameters:
      entry - the entry to be removed.

    • getEntry

      Entry getEntry(String titleKey)
      Retrieves an entry from the database based on its title.
      Parameters:
      titleKey - the title of the entry to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Entry object corresponding to the title, or null if not found.

    • getAllEntries

      List<Entry> getAllEntries()
      Retrieves all entries from the database.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all entries, or null if an error occurs.

    • getEntryTitles

      List<String> getEntryTitles()
      Retrieves a list of all entry titles from the database.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all entry titles, or null if an error occurs.

    • getGroups

      Set<String> getGroups()
      Retrieves a list of all groups from the database.
      Returns:
      A Set<String> containing all the groups retrieved from the database, or null if an SQL exception occurs.
